contact.description:
Thank you for your interest in City's Residences.

Please fill out the registration form below so our team can contact you.

errors.required: Please enter a valid telephone number
errors.min: Telephone number must be at least 8 characters long
errors.max: Telephone number must be at most 15 characters long

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address

howDidYouHearAboutUs.placeholder: How did you hear about us?

consent.placeholder: I have read and accept the <legal1>Personal Data Protection Disclosure Text</legal1>, <legal2>Explicit Consent Text</legal2>, and <legal3>Commercial Electronic Message Disclosure Text</legal3> regarding the personal data I will share within the scope of the citysresidences.com application.

consentElectronicMessage.placeholder: <legal4>I consent</legal4> to receiving commercial electronic messages.

errors.required: Required field, please select at least one of the options below

successDialog.title: Thank You for Your Interest
successDialog.description: A representative from our sales team will contact you shortly. We look forward to speaking with you and sharing details about this special project.

section1.title3: Managing time is transforming life into art...

p1.title:

p1.description: Peace is the privilege of living in harmony with generous nature and endless security in quiet luxurious architecture.

map.title: In the heart of Istanbul, in the prestigious location of Kozyatağı, have the privilege of shaping the city and time according to your own rhythm.

p1.title: LIVE FULLY
p1.description: A living space where luxury and elegance meet, defying time - a unique collection with each piece having its own character and story...
